description: The HpeEventDestination object extends the Redfish EventDestination resource with additional HPE functionality.

DeliveryRetryAttempts.description: This is the number of attempts an event posting is retried before the subscription is terminated.

DeliveryRetryIntervalInSeconds.description: This represents the number of seconds between retry attempts for sending any given Event

MutualAuthenticationEnabled.description: This represents if the subscriber and iLO need to perform mutual authentication when an event is sent.

RequestedMaxEventsToQueue.description: This represents the number of events the service should queue.

RetireOldEventInMinutes.description: This represents the number of minutes until an event is expired.

title: #HpeEventDestination.v2_1_0.HpeEventDestination
